Title: Relates to prevailing wage requirements applicable to construction projects performed under private contract; repealer
Summary: Relates to use of public funds for prevailing wage requirements applicable to construction projects performed under private contract.
LawCode: Amd ยง224-a, rpld ยง224-c, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to prevailing wage requirements applicable to construction projects performed under private contract; and to repeal section 224-c of the labor law, in relation to eliminating the public subsidiary board
